MilitaryUnit.title: MilitaryUnit
MilitaryUnit.description: Represents a military unit within the GeoShield system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the military unit.

name.description: The name of the military unit.

status.description: The current operational status of the unit (e.g., 'operational', 'offline', 'alert').

latitude.description: The current latitude coordinate of the unit's location.

longitude.description: The current longitude coordinate of the unit's location.

mapId.description: The ID of the map this unit belongs to.

OperationTarget.title: OperationTarget
OperationTarget.description: Represents an operation target assigned to a military unit.

id.description: Unique identifier for the operation target.

name.description: The name of the operation target.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of the operation target's location.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate of the operation target's location.

assignedUnitId.description: Reference to MilitaryUnit. The ID of the military unit assigned to this target. (Relationship: MilitaryUnit 1:N OperationTarget)

status.description: The status of the operation target (e.g., 'pending', 'active', 'passive').

mapId.description: The ID of the map this target belongs to.

Decoy.title: Decoy
Decoy.description: Represents a decoy coordinate displayed on the public feed.

publicName.description: The publicly visible name for the decoy, e.g., 'Bölük Alfa'.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of the decoy's location.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate of the decoy's location.

operationTargetId.description: Reference to OperationTarget. The ID of the operation target this decoy is associated with. (Relationship: OperationTarget 1:1 Decoy)

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user (commander or sub-commander) of the system.

password.description: The user's password. Stored in plain text.

assignedUnitId.description: Reference to MilitaryUnit. The ID of the military unit this user is assigned to, if any. (Relationship: MilitaryUnit 1:N User)

canSeeAllUnits.description: Indicates whether the user has permission to see all military units on the map. Only relevant for sub-commanders.

Conversation.title: Conversation
Conversation.description: Represents a conversation between two or more users.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a single message within a conversation.
